name: file-processing-website
description: 基于MonkeyOCR的智能文档解析平台

scripts.backend: cd file_processing_website/backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload'
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && cd file_processing_website/backend && python -m pytest tests/ && cd ../frontend && npm run test

author: AI开发助手
